projects.heading: Explore Cinema - MERN stack Website
projects.tagline: Explore Movies and TV Shows, manage rating and reviews
features: Dynamic Search Capabilities: Users can search for movies, TV shows, and actors using flexible search options, allowing for quick and easy discovery of entertainment content.
Secure User Authentication: Integrated JSON Web Tokens (JWT) for secure user authentication and authorization, ensuring safe and protected user sessions.
User Reviews and Ratings: Implemented a review and rating system where users can leave feedback on movies and TV shows, fostering a community-driven platform.
Real-Time Data Updates: Enabled real-time data handling to ensure users receive the latest information on movies, TV shows, and actors, enhancing the user experience.
projects.project_impact: MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js). By developing a dashboard and implementing CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations, I have gained hands-on experience in building user-friendly interfaces and efficiently managing patient data. This project has allowed me to enhance my skills and proficiency in full-stack web development.

projects.heading: Diet Tracking - Exploring Django Web Application
projects.tagline: Empowering Healthier Choices with Real-Time Data and Secure Tracking
features: User Authentication & Personalized Registration: Users can create accounts with secure authentication, allowing for a personalized experience based on user-specific data such as age, height, weight, and gender. This data is used to calculate ideal BMI and calorie intake.

Meal Journaling with Real-Time Calorie Calculation: The app allows users to journal their meals by adding food items to a list, with real-time calorie calculation to track dietary intake throughout the day.

Calorie Intake Tracking & Automated Recommendations: The app compares users' calorie intake against their ideal levels, offering automated exercise recommendations based on this data. This helps users make informed decisions about their health and fitness routines.
projects.project_impact: This project streamlines diet tracking and assists users in maintaining healthier lifestyles through personalized data analysis and real-time calorie tracking.

projects.heading: Interpreting Human Emotions Through Convolutional Neural Networks
projects.tagline: Discovering Emotions with Convolutional Neural Networks
features: Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) Model: Developed a robust face emotion detection system using a Sequential CNN trained on 1.3 million records, ensuring high accuracy and reliable results.
Data Preprocessing and Model Optimization: Applied effective data preprocessing techniques and utilized callbacks to monitor and improve model accuracy, reducing loss metrics.
Flask Web Application: Created a user-friendly Flask-based web app, enabling users to upload images and receive facial expression predictions in real time.
Visual Analytics and User Engagement: Incorporated a heatmap visualization of the confusion matrix, providing intuitive insights into model performance and enhancing user engagement.
projects.project_impact: Face Emotion Detection with its high-accuracy CNN model and basic web app enables real-time analysis of facial expressions, facilitating enhanced emotional intelligence in applications like mental health monitoring, customer service analysis, and human-computer interaction.
